1. COSTUME

data.short_description: Powerful nations are dispatching mercenaries to secure Q-On at contaminated sites, off limits to most men. Swarming around the sites like a flock of crows, they begin their own battles.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Korean*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit )
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit )
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060, AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended
